title: Food Victoria: a whole world of food (MAC & PC)
creator_credit: Food Victoria, Victorian Dairy Industry Authority and Multimedia Victoria
brief_description: Victoria produces a third of Australia’s raw and processed food. The multimedia interactive program is divided into four sections: Victoria, Dairy, Stone Fruit and a Directory based on a supermarket interface. A wealth of information with excellent graphics and video presentations.
